name: Golden Refreshment
description: 'Golden Refreshment' is a stunning still-life composition featuring a polished golden jug, fresh citrus fruits, and a refreshing glass of lemonade. The warmth of the metallic tones blends harmoniously with the zesty vibrance of the lemons, creating a sense of indulgence and elegance. Painted with meticulous attention to detail, this piece by Bibi in 2024 captures the simple joys of life with sophistication.
